dmca.title: Cease and desist
dmca.body:
Cease and desists using my registered domain name and business name to gain publicity and readers to your blog. You are breaking the very law you are claiming to be a victim of. You cannot use my name in URL's to gain readership.
You used my name and image on your child porno blog and now you are using it again to gain readers to your childish manuscript blog.
You like to point fingers at people and say they are breaking the law when it is actually you doing it.

The site I am reffering to are many. But lets just start with this one:

http://tarquinchurchwellceaseanddesist.blogspot.com

she is using my name to defame me and to attract people to her manuscrpts
